title: Refactor lowering pipeline for replay determinism with stable invariant drift signaling (issue #2105 / task M17-C010)

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0

invariant checks are explicit and fail closed when evidence does not satisfy documented contracts
fixture/manifest evidence parity remains stable for issue-closeout replay

M17C010_validate_invariants returns deterministic drift codes for call-shape, cleanup, or metadata failures
